verses.verse: At <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H6458>Hew<s%> thee <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like unto the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me into the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> thee an <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H6086>wood.<s%>

And I will <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3871>tables<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou didst <S%H7665>break,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H7760>put<s%> them in the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

And I <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6458>hewed<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like unto the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> having the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> in mine <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3871>tables,<s%> according to the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4385>writing,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1697>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> me.

And I turned <S%H6437>myself<s%> and came <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3871>tables<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H6213>made;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H1961>be,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> from <S%H4480>Beeroth<s%> <S%H881><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3292>Jaakan<s%> to <S%H4149>Mosera:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> he was <S%H6912>buried;<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> ministered in the priest's <S%H3547>office<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

From <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> unto <S%H1412>Gudgodah;<s%> and <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H1412>Gudgodah<s%> to <S%H3193>Jotbath,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5158>rivers<s%> of <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

At <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H914>separated<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto him, and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> in his <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H1961>hath<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> his <S%H251>brethren;<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is his <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H834>according<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>promised<s%> him.

And <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H5975>stayed<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> according to the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>time,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7843>destroy<s%> thee.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H1980>take<s%> thy <S%H4550>journey<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they may go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto them.

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> doth the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7592>require<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5973><s%> thee, <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and to <S%H157>love<s%> him, and to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul,<s%>

To <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%> for thy <S%H2896>good?<s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> also, with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> therein is.

Only <S%H7535><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had a <S%H2836>delight<s%> in thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> them, and he <S%H977>chose<s%> their <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, even you above <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
Circumcise <S%H4135><s%> <S%H853>therefore<s%> the <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H6203>stiffnecked.<s%> <S%H7185><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H113>Lord<s%> of <S%H113>lords,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> a <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> and a <S%H3372>terrible,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5375>regardeth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6440>persons,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3947>taketh<s%> reward: <S%H7810><s%>

He doth <S%H6213>execute<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and <S%H490>widow,<s%> and <S%H157>loveth<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> in <S%H5414>giving<s%> him <S%H3899>food<s%> and <S%H8071>raiment.<s%>
Love <S%H157><s%> ye <S%H853>therefore<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> ye <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God;<s%> him shalt thou <S%H5647>serve,<s%> and to him shalt thou <S%H1692>cleave,<s%> and <S%H7650>swear<s%> by his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

He <S%H1931><s%> is thy <S%H8416>praise,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> is thy <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H854>for<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and terrible <S%H3372>things,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen.<s%>

Thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H5315>persons;<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H7760>made<s%> thee as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>
